property.name: Rules
property.value: 己方其他魏势力单位各得+1/+1。每当曹操受到敌方单位或锦囊造成的伤害时，你抓一张牌。Your Wei units get +1/+1. Whenever Cao Cao is dealt damage by units or stratagem you don't control, draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: 只要己方单位比敌方单位多，则消灭目标敌方单位。Destroy target unit you don't control if you control more units than its controler.

property.name: Rules
property.value: 当扈伴战士进入阵地时，将一个1/1魏势力步兵指示物放进阵地。When Warrior Companion enters the battlefield, put a 1/1 Wei Infantry tokens onto the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: 在平原作战时，他们两个一组首尾相顾，配合默契。私下里关系也好得不得了。

property.name: Rules
property.value: 满宠的相对单位和斜对单位各得-1武力。Units facing and diagonal to Man Chong gets -1/-0.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "故能而示之以弱不能，骄之以利，示之以慑。此为形实不必相应也。"— 《三国志·魏书》

property.name: Rules
property.value: 你抓若干张牌，其数量等同于己方单位的数量。Draw cards equal to the number of units you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: 君臣一心，将士用命，天下可定。

card.name: 青州哨卫 Sentinel of Qingzhou

property.name: Rules
property.value: 青州哨卫的斜对单位各得-1武力。Units diagonal to Sentinel of Qingzhou gets -1/-0.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "追黄巾至济北。乞降。冬，受降卒三十余万，男女百余万口，收其精锐者，号为青州兵。"— 《三国志·武帝纪》

card.name: 司隶步兵 Infantry of Sili

property.name: Flavor
property.value: 司隶，下辖河南、河内、河东、弘农、京兆尹、左冯翊、右扶风。建安十七年河内之汤阴、朝歌、林虑划归魏郡。十八年，归魏郡西部都尉。

property.name: Rules
property.value: 转移（具有转移能力的单位可于你回合的法术时机向相邻的空阵地进行一次移动）Swift (Unit with swift can move to an adjacent empty position. Activate this ability at most once only any time you could cast a socery.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: 屯中帐以骑，乃军之栋梁。

property.name: Flavor
property.value: 他们都是百姓甚至贼众，然而在曹操个人魅力的影响下全都改头换面了。

property.name: Rules
property.value: 取消目标正被打出的非领土牌（该牌会直接置入墓地）。Counter target nonland card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "击其懈怠，出其空虚"— 曹操

property.name: Rules
property.value: 转移 每当夏侯惇受到敌方单位或锦囊造成的伤害时，他对目标单位或玩家造成等量的伤害。Swift; Whenever Xiahou Dun is dealt damage by units or stratagems you don't control, he deals that much damage to target unit or player.

property.name: Rules
property.value: 将两个1/1魏势力步兵指示物放进阵地。Put 2 1/1 Wei Infantry tokens onto the battlefield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: 坚韧1 转移 每当你打出一个领土， 你可以将一个1/1魏势力步兵指示物放进阵地。Tough 1; Swift; When you play a land, you may put a 1/1 Wei Infantry token onto the battlefield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: 将目标单位移回其拥有者手上。Return target unit to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: 君臣二心，久战不克，流言四起。终至召回，无功而返矣。

property.name: Rules
property.value: 每个己方单位各得+1武力且具有坚韧1（若具有坚韧1的单位将受到伤害，则防止其中X点）直到回合结束。Each unit you control gets +1/+0 and tough until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: 将目标己方单位移动到你的一个空阵地上，该单位得+1武力直到回合结束。Move target unit you control to an empty position on your side, this unit gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: 东州步兵 Infantry of Dongzhou

property.name: Rules
property.value: 只要东州步兵没有相邻单位，他便得+1武力。Infantry of Dongzhou gets +1/+0 if it has no adjacent units.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: 季玉手下时，他们以十打一；皇叔入主后，他们以一顶十。

property.name: Rules
property.value: 目标单位得+3武力且具有坚韧3（若此单位将受到伤害，则防止其中3点）直到回合结束。Target unit gets +3/+0 and tough 3 (prevent 3 damage that would be dealt to this unit) until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "大王以龙虎之姿，遭风云之时，奋迅拔起，期月之间兄弟称王。"—《后汉书》

property.name: Rules
property.value: 破竹（此单位于进攻中造成多余的战斗伤害，将分配给防御玩家）。当关羽进入阵地时，他与相对单位决斗（他们各向对方造成等同于自身武力的伤害）。Trample (If this creature would assign enough damage to its blocker, the rest of its damage is assigned to the defending player). When Guan Yu enters the battlefield, he duel with his facing unit (They deal damage equal to their power to each other).

property.name: Rules
property.value: 目标己方单位与目标对方单位决斗（他们各向对方造成等同于自身武力的伤害）。Target unit you control duel with target unit you don't control (They deal damage equal to their power to each other).

property.name: Rules
property.value: 转移（具有转移能力的单位可于你回合的常时时机向相邻的空阵地进行一次移动）廖化对玩家造成的伤害会让你回复等量的体力。Swift (Unit with swift can move to an adjacent empty position. Activate this ability at most once only any time you could cast a socery.) Damage dealt by Liao Hua to players also causes you to restore that much health.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: 廖元俭诈死归蜀。其节不下于关将军！

property.name: Rules
property.value: 己方其他蜀势力单位各得+1/+1。在你的回合结束时，你和每个己方单位各回复1点体力。Your Shu units get +1/+1. At the end of your turn, restore 1 health to you and all units you control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: 目标单位或玩家回复7点体力。Restore 7 health to target unit or player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: 仲景出长沙，元化旅江夏。不为强权低，神针济汉家。

card.name: 蜀重骑兵 Heavey Cavalry of Shu

property.name: Rules
property.value: 转移（具有转移能力的单位可于你回合的常时时机向相邻的空阵地进行一次移动）坚韧1（若此单位将受到伤害，则防止其中1点）Swift (Unit with swift can move to an adjacent empty position. Activate this ability at most once only any time you could cast a socery.) Tough 1 (prevent 1 damage that would be dealt to this unit)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: 人马铠甲重百来斤，锁子连环，箭不可入。威其至冲，凌厉异常，势不可当！

property.name: Rules
property.value: 王平的相邻单位皆具有坚韧1（若具有坚韧1的单位将受到伤害，则防止其中1点）。Units adjacent to Wang Ping get tough 1 (prevent 1 damage that would be dealt to this unit)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: 丞相身后出英雄，无当飞军镇汉中。谁言蜀末无能将，一失一得两街亭。

property.name: Rules
property.value: 破竹（此单位于进攻中造成多余的战斗伤害，将分配给防御玩家）骁志残兵进入阵地时对自身造成3点伤害。Trample (If this creature would assign enough damage to its blocker, the rest of its damage is assigned to the defending player) When Tenacious Remnant enters the battlefield, he deals 3 damage to himself.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: 益残益战，以难以勇。匹夫有节，三冠其弘。金石以砺，天地以气。扬吾军威，唯吾正义！

card.name: 新野百骑长 Centurion of Xinye

property.name: Flavor
property.value: 新野就是他最早的练兵场，那个时候他发掘了不少能统率百人的可塑人才。以至当阳兵败后，虽然士兵所剩不多，但很快又能形成一支客观的军事力量。

card.name: 新野兵勇 Brave of Xinye

property.name: Flavor
property.value: 那时新野的青年都争相加入刘备军，因为数月之后，他们就可以学会如何保护自己及自己的家人。

property.name: Rules
property.value: 当伊籍进入阵地时，选择一项：目标单位或玩家回复3点体力；或重置目标己方单位。When Yi Ji enters the battlefield, choose one: restore 3 health to target unit or player; or untap target unit you control.

card.name: 益州主力 Main Force of Yizhou

property.name: Rules
property.value: 破竹（此单位于进攻中造成多余的战斗伤害，将分配给防御玩家）。Trample (If this creature would assign enough damage to its blocker, the rest of its damage is assigned to the defending player)

property.name: Rules
property.value: 当运粮队进入阵地时，目标单位或玩家回复2点体力。When Convoy enters the battlefield, restore 2 health to target unit or player.

property.name: Rules
property.value: 重置目标单位。你抓一张牌。Untap target unit. Draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: 你可以随时使陈武得+3武力直到回合结束，若如此做，则本回合结束时将陈武置入你的墓地。You may let Chen Wu get +3/+0 until next turn. If you do, put Chen Wu into your graveyard at end of turn.

card.name: 东吴水军 Marine of Wu

property.name: Flavor
property.value: 船战有三难：一曰迎风射箭；二曰板上肉搏；三曰水下歼敌。而东吴水兵皆能也！

property.name: Rules
property.value: 射击（此单位可以不被反击地攻击斜对单位）Archery (This creature can attack diagnal creatures without being counterattacked.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: 东吴斗舰一里之外令人胆丧，然而接近之后你会发现它更加可怕的地方。

card.name: 江陵策士 Chancellor of Jiangling

property.name: Rules
property.value: 当江陵策士进入阵地时，可以将目标己方单位移动到你的一个空阵地上。When Chancellor of Jiangling enters the battlefield, you may move target unit you control to an empty position on your side.

card.name: 锦帆传令使 Herald of Jinfan

property.name: Rules
property.value: 当锦帆传令使进入阵地时，他可以与一个相邻单位交换位置。When Herald of Jinfan enters the battlefield, you may switch his place with an adjacent unit.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: 兴霸的军队简直就是水面上的一道风景，连换岗时的调动都那么有美感。

property.name: Rules
property.value: 冷箭对目标单位或玩家造成2点伤害。Sudden Shot deals 2 damage to target unit or player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: 我本来也是一个将军，直到我的膝盖中了一箭。I used to be a general like you. Then I took an arrow in the knee.

card.name: 庐江步兵 Infantry of Lujiang

property.name: Flavor
property.value: 庐江步部仅千人，战时善水遁，人莫知其踪而陷。

property.name: Rules
property.value: 落石对目标相对阵地为空的单位造成5点伤害。Rockfall deals 5 damage to target unit facing an empty position.

property.name: Rules
property.value: 吕范的相邻单位皆具有射击能力（具有射击能力的单位可以不被反击地攻击斜对单位）。Units adjacent to Lv Fan have archery (Unit with archery can attack diagnal units without being counterattacked).

property.name: Flavor
property.value: 及权继其业，有吕范、朱然以为爪牙，分任授职，乘间伺隙，兵不妄动，故战少败而江南安。

property.name: Rules
property.value: 己方其他吴势力单位各得+1/+1。X，弃X张手牌：你抓X张牌。此能力只能在每回合常时时机启动一次。Your Wu units get +1/+1. X, discard X cards: you draw X cards. Activate this ability at most once only any time you could cast a socery.

property.name: Rules
property.value: 万箭齐发对每个敌方单位各造成2点伤害。Thousand Arrows deals 2 damage to each unit you don't control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: 弓开如满月，箭走似流星。

property.name: Rules
property.value: 当掷矛手进入阵地时，他对目标单位或玩家造成1点伤害。When Skirmisher enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to target unit or player.

property.name: Rules
property.value: 在你的抓牌步骤额外抓一张牌。你的锦囊伤害和己方单位的射击伤害各+1。You draw an extra card at your draw step. Your Stratagem and archery damage +1.

property.name: Rules
property.value: 射击（此单位可以不被反击地攻击斜对单位）Archery (This unit can attack diagnal units without being counterattacked)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: 江河与丛林的地貌，使他们的箭术比中原人高上数倍。

property.name: Rules
property.value: 消灭目标单位。Destroy target unit.

card.name: 地公将军·张宝 Zhang Bao, General of Earth

property.name: Rules
property.value: 当张宝进入阵地时，将至多两个费用小于或等于2的黄巾单位牌从你的墓地返回阵地。When Zhang Bao, General of Earth enters the battlefield, return at most 2 Yellow-Turban units with cost less than or equal to 2.

property.name: Rules
property.value: 横置：选择两个目标非女性单位进行决斗（他们各向对方造成等同于自身武力的伤害），启动此能力后貂蝉下回合不能重置。tap: Choose 2 target non-female units, they duel (They deal damage equal to their power to each other)，Diao Chan doesn't untap next turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: 当后宫内侍死去时，他对目标玩家造成2点伤害。When Harem Servant dies, he deals 2 damage to target player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: 时下的宦官惹不得，若让他们恨起你来，还不如早早服毒自己了断的好。

property.name: Rules
property.value: 当华歆进入阵地时，查看一名玩家的牌堆顶牌，你可以将该牌置入该玩家的墓地。When Hua Xin enters the battlefield, you may look at the top card of target player's library, you may put this card into his or her graveyard.

card.name: 黄巾步兵 Infantry of the Yellow Turbans

property.name: Flavor
property.value: 这哪里是兵？分明是农民。一个黄头巾就让他们如此狂热，这是信仰还是愚蠢？

card.name: 黄巾传道者 Preacher of the Yellow Turbans

property.name: Rules
property.value: 当黄巾传道者死去时，将一个1/1群雄势力黄巾步兵指示物放进原先的阵地。When Preacher of the Yellow Turbans dies, put a 1/1 Warlords Yellow-Turban Infantry token on the same position.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: 杀死一个，又来一个，就好像之前那个复活了一样，这就是信仰之力吗？

card.name: 黄巾大军 Army of the Yellow Turbans

property.name: Rules
property.value: 你墓地中每有一张黄巾单位牌，打出此牌的费用便减少1。Army of the Yellow Turbans costs 1 less to cast for each Yellow-Turban in your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: 说不上是信仰还是斗志还是仅仅被饥荒所迫，他们就那样铺天盖地而来，碾过所有尸体和没有生命的东西。

property.name: Rules
property.value: 将墓地中的目标单位牌放进你的阵地。Put target unit from the graveyard onto your battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: 据说太平道最可怕的常时就是能让死人复活，但那只是民间很不常见的一种医术罢了。

property.name: Rules
property.value: 目标玩家失去5点体力。Target player lose 5 health.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: 南方有蛮，诅咒于缠。无施无治，无力回天。

property.name: Rules
property.value: 雷击随机对一个对方单位造成3点伤害。Lightning Strike deals 3 damage to a random unit you don't control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: 北方平原上的雷电可不长眼，管你是小兵还是将军。传说那是大贤良师的常时。

property.name: Rules
property.value: 己方黄巾单位皆具有神速能力（具有神速能力的单位可立即发起攻击）。Yellow-Turban units you control have haste (Creature with haste can attack as soon as it comes under your control.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: 神速（此单位可立即发起攻击）。盲兵每回合若能攻击则必须攻击。Haste (This creature can attack as soon as it comes under your control.), Blind Soldier attacks each turn if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: 说不上是信仰还是斗志还是仅仅被饥荒所迫，他们就那样铺天盖地而来，碾过所有尸体和没有生命的东西。

card.name: 平原义军 Rebel of Pingyuan

property.name: Flavor
property.value: 响应而来的其实都是平民，他们拿起矛戈就精神抖擞了起来。汉王朝的号召力依然可观。

card.name: 人公将军·张梁 Zhang Liang, General of Mankind

property.name: Rules
property.value: 己方黄巾单位各得+1/+1。Yellow-Turban units you control get +1/+1.

property.value: 每当另一个单位死去时，目标玩家失去1点体力。When another unit dies, target player lose 1 health.

property.name: Rules
property.value: 目标玩家弃两张手牌。Target player discard 2 cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: 3，将此领土翻为面向下：你抓一张牌。3, flip: draw a card.
